== Kurichikkara (CT) (627836) ==

Kurichikkara (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 3.18 sq. km. and harbouring 1063 households with total population of 4081 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 14 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 309 km. Male population is 1993 and female population is 2088. Scheduled Caste population is 245 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1. Census Location Code of the town is 627836<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class VI (population_total < 5,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 14 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 89 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 14 km.
